name: databox-driver-sensordemo-node
description: A sensor network Databox driver in Node.js

scripts.publish: docker build -t databox-driver-sensordemo-node . && docker tag databox-driver-sensordemo-node localhost:5000/databox-driver-sensordemo-node && docker push localhost:5000/databox-driver-sensordemo-node
